properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_GRADE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_GRADE = 20 AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_NAME
INSERT INTO COMMU ( COMMU_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , USER_NO , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , COUNT , WRITER_NO , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMU_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , ? , DEFAULT )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT COMMU_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , C.USER_NO , M.USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , COUNT , C.WRITER_NO , W.USER_NAME , C.STATUS FROM COMMU C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER W ON(C.WRITER_NO = W.USER_NO) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COMMU_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , C.USER_NO , M.USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , COUNT , C.WRITER_NO , W.USER_NAME , C.STATUS FROM COMMU C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER W ON(C.WRITER_NO = W.USER_NO) WHERE COMMU_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMU WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT COMMU_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , C.USER_NO , M.USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , COUNT , C.WRITER_NO , W.USER_NAME , C.STATUS FROM COMMU C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER W ON(C.WRITER_NO = W.USER_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_GRADE = 20 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_GRADE = 20 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , W.FILE_PATH , W.GREETING , W.ORIGIN_FILE , W.CHANGE_FILE FROM MEMBER M, W_PROFILE W WHERE M.USER_NO = W.WRITER_NO(+) AND USER_GRADE = 20 ORDER BY USER_NAME) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT M.USER_NO , M.USER_NAME , W.FILE_PATH , W.GREETING , W.ORIGIN_FILE , W.CHANGE_FILE FROM MEMBER M, W_PROFILE W WHERE M.USER_NO = W.WRITER_NO(+) AND USER_GRADE = 20 AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY USER_NAME) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMU WHERE WRITER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT COMMU_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , C.USER_NO , M.USER_ID , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , COUNT , C.WRITER_NO , W.USER_NAME , C.STATUS FROM COMMU C JOIN MEMBER W ON(C.WRITER_NO = W.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.WRITER_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE COMMU SET REPLY = ? , STATUS = 'Y' WHERE COMMU_NO = ?
